products.title: Ashville Grey Weave Roman Blind
products.description: If you love their bordered roman blinds then youre sure to love the ones from tuiss even more. They have the added luxury of the bordered fabric on three sides rather than two. Here, a thickly woven grey fabric is surrounded by an off-white. This combo carries such grace and if you love their bordered roman blinds then youre sure to love the ones from tuiss even more.
